briefTitle: A Study of Cytisinicline for Smoking Cessation in Adult Smokers
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Phase 3 Trial Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Cytisinicline in Adult Smokers
summary: This placebo-controlled Phase 3 study is being conducted at sites within the United States to evaluate 3 mg cytisinicline 3 times daily (TID) for treatment duration of 42 days/6 weeks and evaluate 3 mg cytisinicline TID for treatment duration of 84 days/12 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Smoking Abstinence From Weeks 3 to Week 6

effectByArm.arm: 6 Week Cytisinicline + 6 Week Placebo + Behavioral Support
